translations: 程式设计，程序编排；节目制作
编写程序；设计程式（program 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: n. 程序设计；程式设计
n. 发展计划；开发方案

sentences.sentence: But in the case of oop programing there are no objects in machine language.
sentences.translation: 但在面向对象编程中有没有对象的情况下机器语言。

sentences.sentence: PHP would surely have lost a lot of its appeal if it had not moved to support OO programing in PHP 5.
sentences.translation: 如果PHP 5没有支持面向对象编程的话，肯定会丧失很多吸引力。

sentences.sentence: I think that increased data volumes will impact day to day programing work far more than multicore will.
sentences.translation: 我想在对日常编程工作的影响上，增长的数据容量要远远超过多核。
